, but The Tourist star's rep insists Angelina Jolie has only been meeting with officials and lawyers in the country to set up her own charitable foundation for the impoverished nation's children. The spokesperson says, There is no truth to these rumors. Angelina Jolie is focused on enhancing the welfare and legal protection of children within Haiti. As such, she has been meeting with government of Haiti officials, Haitian legal experts and non-governmental organizations regarding a new initiative of the Brad Pitt Foundation. The recently launched Angelina Jolie Legal Fellows Program will assist the justice system in Haiti to improve child protection.
